name: Introduction to Chemistry
description: This course provides an overview of the fundamentals of Chemistry, including topics such as atomic and molecular structure, chemical bonding, and the fundamentals of thermodynamics and kinetics.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: This course covers the fundamentals of organic chemistry, including topics such as nomenclature, structure and bonding, mechanisms, and spectroscopy.

name: Inorganic Chemistry
description: This course covers the fundamentals of inorganic chemistry, including topics such as atomic and molecular structure, acid-base chemistry, coordination chemistry, and organometallic chemistry.

name: Physical Chemistry
description: This course covers the fundamentals of physical chemistry, including thermodynamics, chemical kinetics, quantum mechanics, and spectroscopy.
